name: Christian Vampire Boy's Love Story
description:
Do you love God? Do you love vampires (specifically the ones from Vampire: the Requiem)? Do you like men? If you answered yes to at least 3 of these questions you might find this game worth playing!

Game features:

  • 4 boys to romance with 7 endings!
  • terrible MIDI soundtrack, stock photo backgrounds, and inadequate concept art characters!
  • jokes?
  • deep lore you will only understand if you read the wiki/book
  • gay christian vampires!!!!!!!!!!!!

note: the screenshots show a save button but this was removed in the game because the software i used didnt have a functioning save option :/

things stolen from:

sfx from soundbible.com & backgrounds from various stock photo websites (read the watermarks lol)
